title: Railroads Have Invested Heavily in Congress. They Need Their Payoff in the Senate.
description:
A looming Senate vote on seven days of sick leave for rail workers puts pressure on a Republican Party that has increasingly positioned itself as a champion of the working class.

The post Railroads Have Invested Heavily in Congress. They Need Their Payoff in the Senate. appeared first on The Intercept.

title: War Industry Looking Forward to “Multiyear Authority” in Ukraine
description:
Next year’s defense authorization envisions pouring billions in no-bid contracts into the U.S. war machine’s “industrial base.”

The post War Industry Looking Forward to “Multiyear Authority” in Ukraine appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Iran’s Protest Movement and Its Future
description:
People have taken to the streets in Iran for over two months. Will the movement lead to the regime’s collapse?

The post Iran’s Protest Movement and Its Future appeared first on The Intercept.
